dataList.dlg: Who chose to bring me here? Think you can handle the consequences?
Dawn isn't the time for me. I wonder why people waste their energy getting up early?
Wow~ What a lovely day for mutilation~ Isn't that right, Dante? ...Aha, I was kidding, of course.
I heard Rodya is such a skilled gambler, is that right? Perhaps I'll ask her for a game?
Dante, how about changing from that drab outfit into a more unique attire that better suits a manager? I could give you some clothing if you want.
Now... You're not upset at me or anything, right, Dante? I can't see your expression, so it's been kind of irritating~
How do you hold a knife? Simple. Just grab it however you like and swing it on a whim.
You see, luck... is something you earn. Life doesn't serve you a jackpot if you just sit still and wait~
I'll introduce you to my buddies later~ They can be rough talkers, but they're all nice when you get to know them~
Gee, it looks like someone doesn't value their own life, huh?
Oh, you're flattering me~ I won't say no to it, though~
Is it my turn?
Let's get some warm-up~
Do you need my help, Dante?
I hope luck is at my side~
Did you see, Dante?
Unk!
Just too easy~
Maybe I should've lent a little bit of my luck?
Luck correlates with skill.
Hmm... Fortune isn't on my side.
This was basically child's play~
Oh my, we're done with them already~ I can go now, can't I?
This... can't be...?
